articles.title: Part 1: Introduction
articles.text: HTML means HyperTextMarkupLanguage. HTML is a Document containing Text. Web Browsers can read and display the documents that contain HTML. HTML consists of Tags like &ltbody&gt &lth1&gt and more...

articles.title: Part 2: Creating first website
articles.text:
The most important tags are html,head and body. The head tag contains meta information about your website.
The body contains the HTML Structure that is shown in the browser
articles.snippet:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
<title>Page Title</title>
</head>
<body>
<h1>This is a Heading</h1>
<p>This is a paragraph.</p>
</body>
</html>

articles.title: Part 3: Line break, spacing, and comments
articles.text:
You can make line breaks with <br>, spacing with serveral methods.
Comments can be made with /*coment*/

articles.title: Part 4: Ordered and Unordered Lists
articles.text: The following code example shows you how to make a list in HTML
articles.snippet:
< ul>
<li>This is list item 1</li>
<li>This is list item 2</li>
<li>This is list item 3</li>
<li>This is list item 4</li>
</ul>

articles.title: Part 5: Tables
articles.text: In HTML you can also make Tables like in Excel

articles.text: Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) is a style sheet language used for describing the look and formatting of a document in HTML
